sources.title: The Lion and the Mouse (1943)
sources.description: This is actually a "Super Mouse" cartoon. The character was not known as "Mighty Mouse" until The Wreck of the Hesperus. In the altered-for-TV version, however, he is "Mighty Mouse." Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-lion-and-the-mouse-1943/

metadata.Plot: A drunken mouse attacks a sleeping lion, but his life is spared by the lion. Later, when the lion's life is in danger , the mouse comes to the rescue.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Donald McKee
